resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/103535</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>103535</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770207173</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Radio Fights Jim Crow</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Radio Kämpft Jim Krähe</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Radio Combat La Corneille de Jim</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O Rádio Luta O Corvo De Jim</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La Radio Combatte Il Corvo Di Jim</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ραδιο πάλες jim Crow</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La Radio Lucha El Cuervo De Jim</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">looks at a series of radio programs aimed to mend the racial and ethnic divisions that threatened America.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Blicke auf eine Reihe Radioprogramme zielten 
darauf ab, die rassischen und ethnischen Abteilungen zu reparieren, 
die Amerika bedrohten.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">les regards à une série de programmes par radio 
ont visé à réparer les divisions raciales et ethniques qui ont 
menacé l'Amérique.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">os olhares em uma série dos programas de rádio 
apontaram emendar as divisões raciais e étnicas que ameaçaram 
América.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">gli sguardi ad una serie di programmi radiofonici 
hanno mirato a riparare le divisioni razziali ed etniche che hanno 
minacciato l'America.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">εξετάζει μια σειρά ραδιο προγραμμάτων που στοχεύουν να
επιδιορθώσουν τα φυλετικά και εθνικά τμήματα που απείλησαν την 
Αμερική.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">las miradas en una serie de programas de radio 
apuntaron reparar las divisiones raciales y étnicas que amenazaron 
América.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770207173</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>103535</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/radio-fights-jim-crow</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
